markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swap Investment](/Feats.aspx?ID=2231) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 41</row>

**Archetype** [Pathfinder Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=13)

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
[Pathfinder Agent Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=871)

</column>

---

Your time as a Pathfinder has taught you how to improvise, and you've learned to make use of the resources you find in the field. You Invest a magic item and remove a previously invested item. The previous item no longer counts against your limit of 10 invested items.
name: Swap Investment
